---
title: "parkinsonian-features"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(fxtas)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
parkinsonian_vars =
    c(
      "parkinsonian features",
      "Masked faces",
      "Increased tone",
      "Pill rolling tremor",
      "Stiff gait")
parkinsonian_data = 
  trax_gp34_all |> select(all_of(parkinsonian_vars))
parkinsonian_data |> summary()
parkinsonian_data |> filter(`parkinsonian features` == "Yes") |> 
  select(-`parkinsonian features`) |> ftable(row.vars = 1:2)

parkinsonian_data |> filter(`parkinsonian features` == "No")
```
